name: Name
not-authorized: Not authorized. Please contact the administrator.
invalid-url-with-example: Please provide a url in this format: eg. https://www.vinted.co.uk/catalog?...
must-have-brand-query-param: URL must have brand query parameter. Please search for at least one brand.
url-contains-search-text: URL contains search_text parameter, the results may not be accurate or incomplete. Avoid using this parameter if possible to get the best results.
country-has-been-added: The country code {countryCode} has been successfully added to the {type} whitelist.
country-has-been-removed: The country code {countryCode} has been successfully removed from the {type} whitelist.
invalid-country-code: The {countryCode} is not a valid country code. Please select from one of those countries code : {validCountryCodes}
user-info-success: Find below the information about the user!
user-not-admin: The user is not an administrator.
channel-id-required: Channel ID is required, please provide a channel ID
channel-info-success: Find the information about the channel below!
channel-name-required: Channel name is required, please provide a channel name
channel-not-found-nor-owned: Channel not found or you don't own this channel.
no-channels-found: No channels found, you should maybe create one first.
channel-limit-exceeded: Channel limit exceeded. You can only create {limit} channel(s).
max-channels-set-success: The max channels has been successfully set.
all-public-channels-deleted-error:
There was an error deleting all public channels.
```{error}```
all-public-channels-deleted-success: All public channels have been successfully deleted.
creating-public-channel-error:
There was an error creating the public channel.
```{error}```
not-allowed-to-create-public-channel: You do not have the required roles to create a public channel.
not-allowed-to-delete-public-channel: You do not have the required roles to delete a public channel.
public-channel-created-success: Your public channel {channelName} has been successfully created.
public-channel-deleted-error:
There was an error deleting the public channel.
```{error}```
public-channel-deleted-success: Your public channel has been successfully deleted.
public-channel-link-success: Public channel has been linked successfully and is now monitoring [Vinted Search]({url}).
public-channel-welcome: Welcome to your public channel {user}! You can now start monitoring the Vinted catalog search. `/monitoring start`
all-private-channels-deleted-error:
There was an error deleting all private channels.
```{error}```
all-private-channels-deleted-success: All private channels have been successfully deleted.
not-allowed-to-create-private-channel: The administrator has disabled the ability to create private channels. Please contact the administrator.
private-channel-created-success: Your private channel {channelName} has been successfully created.
private-channel-created-error:
There was an error creating the private channel.
```{error}```
private-channel-delete-select: Select the private channel to delete
private-channel-deleted-error:
There was an error deleting the private channel.
```{error}```
private-channel-deleted-discord-error:
Failed to delete private channel through Discord.
```{error}```
private-channel-deleted-success: Your private channel has been successfully deleted.
private-channel-welcome: Welcome to your private channel {user}! You can now start monitoring the Vinted catalog search. `/monitoring start`
channel-inactivity-warning: Your channel has been inactive for a while.
reply-to-keep-channel: Reply to this message to keep the channel {channelName}, otherwise it will be deleted in {time} hours.
mentions-select-channel: Select the channel to update mentions for
mentions-has-been-updated: The mentions have been {status} for the {type}.
mentions-update-enabled: Mentions have been enabled for the channel.
mentions-update-disabled: Mentions have been disabled for the channel.
mentions-update-error:
There was an error updating the mentions.
```{error}```
monitoring-start-error:
There was an error starting the monitoring session.
```{error}```
monitoring-has-been-started: The monitoring has been started [Vinted Catalog Search]({url}).
monitoring-stopped-error:
There was an error stopping the monitoring session.
```{error}```
command-not-allowed-outside-commands-cha: This command is not allowed outside the commands channel. Please use <#{commandChannelId}> or one of your private channels.
command-execution-error:
There was an error executing the command.
```{error}```
drop-data_not-allowed: You are not allowed to drop vintedbots saved data.
